text: Another person on the Apple leadership page changes their title in 2025
full-pick-text: Another person on the Apple leadership page changes their title in 2025
notes:
• The leadership page at the time of recording.
  • There was some debate about whether the rather surprising leadership shuffles toward the end of 2025 actually included title changes, but indeed some more mundane title changes happened as well, so the question was moot.
